content: stitch across half_double_crochet in last st turn 10 stars + 1 half_double_crochet make this first star like the strap using the chain stitches and base of the first st row 4 chain 1 skip next st 2sc into the eye of each star around single_crochet into the top of the chain 3 from beginning of the row 21 st turn row 5 chain 1 single_crochet in each st 21 st you will have created the ankle section it should measure approx 1 for a taller heel repeat row 5 until desired height 17 making the heel strap right foot for the right foot we will continue without ending off we will work a foundation double_crochet fdc stitch to make the strap 1 yarn over and insert hook into the eye of the last star yarn over and draw through 3 loops on hook 2 yarn over draw through one loop yarn over draw through two loops yarn over draw through the last two loops your first fdc is complete 3 work 9 fdc stitches 10 fdc 4 chain 4 and slip_stitch into the base of the last fdc to make a loop for the button end off if you have a larger button work an extra chain to make the loop bigger making the heel strap left foot for the left shoe end off after row 5 of the making the heel section of the pattern this strap is made separately 1 chain 4 make your first foundation double_crochet fdc make another 9 fdc leaving a tail long enough to sew to the heel of the shoe 10 fdc 2 attach the strap to the right side of the heel with a slip_stitch into the top of the single_crochet from row 5 use a yarn needle to attach the bottom of the strap to the side of the heel 3 the side that has the chain 4 in the first fdc will become the button hole for securing the button to the opposite side attach a decorative button to both shoes and you are done enjoy your sandals © emmeclaire crochet 2017 18
